text: Robert "Rob" Cohen (born March 12, 1949) is an American movie director and producer. He is known for directing the entire Fast and Furious movie series. He also directed A Small Circle of Friends, Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story, Dragonheart, Daylight, and xXx. ==Other websites== * * Rare 1989â€“1990 Footage of Rob Cohen Directing Dick Wolf's "Nasty Boys" Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:American screenwriters Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Movie producers from New York (state)
title: Rob Cohen
